# 工具/库

# 团队模块

@w6s 为团队所使用的默认 npm-scope, 所有以团队名义发布到 npm 的包，名字都应该以 @w6s/[package-name] 的方式命名！如：@w6s/fedd。

访问WorkPlusFE GitHub。

# js-sdk

WorkPlusFE JavaScript SDK.

# cli

A CLI for scaffolding starter projects.

# dev-tools

w6s 轻应用开发者工具。

# codash

A Cordova utility library.

# open-desktop-application

通过 URL协议 打开桌面应用。

# fedd

WorkPlusFE development CLI documentation.

# vddl

Vue components for modifying lists with the HTML5 drag & drop API.

# compare-versions

A simple version comparison tool.

# simple-storage

Base on localStorage and sessionStorage.

# query-string

Parse and stringify URL

# escape

Toggle escape string and object for use in HTML.

# 其他

# AJAX 库

  • axios Promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js.

  • fetch A window.fetch JavaScript polyfill.

# 函数库

  • underscore JavaScript's utility _ belt.

  • lodash A modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance, & extras.

  • moment Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates in javascript.

  • date-fns Modern JavaScript date utility library.

# 加解密

  • crypto-js JavaScript library of crypto standards.

# 国际化

  • vue-i18n Internationalization plugin for Vue.js .

  • polyglot.js Give your JavaScript the ability to speak many languages.

# 文档

  • vuepress Minimalistic Vue-powered static site generator.

  • docsify A magical documentation site generator.

  • gitbook Modern documentation format and toolchain using Git and Markdown.
